mutants.code:
import re
from collections import OrderedDict

def total_match(lst1, lst2, case_sensitive=True):
    lst1 = [re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower() if not case_sensitive else re.sub('\\W+', '', s) for s in lst1]
    lst2 = [re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower() if not case_sensitive else re.sub('\\W+', '', s) for s in lst2]
    (lst1, lst2) = (list(OrderedDict.fromkeys(lst1)), list(OrderedDict.fromkeys(lst2)))
    return lst1 if sum((len(s) for s in lst1)) <= sum((len(s) for s in lst2)) else lst2

mutants.original_line: return lst1 if sum(len(s) for s in lst1) <= sum(len(s) for s in lst2) else lst2
mutants.mutated_line: return lst1 if sum((len(s) for s in lst1)) < sum((len(s) for s in lst2)) else lst2

import re
from collections import OrderedDict

def total_match(lst1, lst2, case_sensitive=False):
    lst1 = [re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower() if not case_sensitive else re.sub('\\W+', '', s) for s in lst1]
    lst2 = [re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', s).lower() if not case_sensitive else re.sub('\\W+', '', s) for s in lst2]
    (lst1, lst2) = (list(OrderedDict.fromkeys(lst1)), list(OrderedDict.fromkeys(lst2)))
    return lst1 if sum((len(s) for s in lst1)) <= sum((len(s) for s in lst2)) else lst2
